name: us-web-design-standards
description: Open source UI components and visual style guide for U.S. government websites

scripts.organize-release: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r assets/* dist && rm dist/css/styleguide.scss && cp _site/assets/css/main.css dist/css/uswds.css
scripts.zip-release: cd ./dist && zip -r -X zip/uswds-v$npm_package_version.zip css _scss fonts img js -x "*.DS_Store" && cd ..
scripts.zip: npm run jekyll-build && npm run organize-release && npm run zip-release && npm run jekyll-build

author: 18F (https://18f.gsa.gov)
